org.codehaus.mojo.rpm

Class SoftlinkSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.rpm.Source
      • org.codehaus.mojo.rpm.SoftlinkSource

  • public class SoftlinkSource
extends Source
    A Source that simply indicates that the Source.getLocation() is to be linked to the Mapping.getDirectory().
    Since:
    2.0-beta-3
    Author:
    Brett Okken Cerner Corp.
